reviews.review: Epic

I dont recommend buying the game tho, just go play it on xbox 360 for a better experience and that way you dont have to deal with the problems that come with trying to get this game to run on your pc. It took me over a year to get the game to run just a couple times on my pc, and now its back to not running. i tried all the "fixes" I could find but none of them really seems to work. Does anyone know how to 100% fix this game on pc, its one of my favorite rpgs ive ever played so if only it would work every time i want to go play it.

I did not get a chance to play this when it came out but even today it is really a fun game enjoyed every minute of it. The weapons and armor and spells can stack just adds a whole different level to the game it was very fun and interesting to play. Though the co op is a joke you just play together on a map not the campgain.
No
combat is easy to learn hard to master, fights are almost always unfair, W game
J'ai bien aimé ce jeu, mais alors la fin... Zéro de chez zéro. Je n'ai même pas les cinématiques de fin sur la version de Steam. Décevant, franchement...

This game is highly underrated and i would say it still holds up as a decent dungeon crawler, hack-n-slash, loot-fest game. A LOT of different armors and weapons that can stack together infinitely, meaning that finding something you already have is just as exciting as finding something new. 5 different schools of magic with different types of spells, and yes, you can stack spells you already know to make them stronger. Deep customization of the hero's stats and skills allows for no two play-throughs will feel the same, not to mention a huge and varied map with tons of enemy types, quests, and so much to explore.

No matter how much time passes, this game will never cease to bring me the greatest joy!
I couldnt even point out why I enjoy Two Worlds so much, even now in 2022, but its still one of the most enjoyable titles in my gaming history and even thinking about it gets me pumped up!

Its not the prettiest game.
its not unique in any special kind.
Its wasnt even adequate to the current technology when it came out.
Its just a Gothic/Risen-like game with less character, a joke of a story and no classic plump german humour.

And yet I love every inch of it.
I like stacking identical weapons and armors to increase their values.
I like using magic via (stacked) cards and booster cards.
I like the design of the world and limitless quest acceptance.
I like the stupidly basic hit-dodge CQC.

TLDR; I love this game. If you consider it, I'd always recommend this.
j'aime ce jeu mais ,jai pas de son

Что ж. Я пытался. Много раз в разные годы скачивал эту игру и каждый раз мои попытки дать ей шанс с треском проваливались. Скучный сюжет, глючный геймплей, а так же кошмарная оригинальная озвучка - гвозди в крышку гроба сего творения. Рад, что игра в очередной раз удалена и забыта. Надеюсь теперь уже навсегда. Удивительно лишь, что в итоге разработчики сумели сделать неплохую вторую часть.
Kiepski dubbing, toporna jak Gothic, ale wciąga jak bagno. Mechaniki, crafting, elementy RPG, żyjący świat, wszystko to na wysokim poziomie. Budżetowy Oblivion, w pozytywnym sensie.
I've played over 90 hours and not even scratched the surface of how long and fun this game can be. So many options of game play. Just go and enjoy. It's just too fun!
типичный клон киберпанка

САМА ПО СЕБЕ ИГРА ТАКАЯ СЕБЕ, МЕХАНИКА БОЯ УЧИТЫВАЯ ЧТО ИГРА 2009 ГОДА ХОРОША, УДРУЧАЕТ ЛИШЬ САМ  СЮЖЕТ,  КАК ПО МНЕ ТАКОЙ СЕБЕ, А ВТОРИЧНЫЕ ЗАДАНИЯ И ВОСВЕ СКУЧНЫЕ, ПО ТИПУ ПОЙДИ УБЕЙ ЭТИХ, ПРИНЕСИ ТО, ПРИНЕСИ ЭТО, КОРОЧЕ СЛИШКОМ ВСЕ БАНАЛЬНО, ТАК ЧИСТО ВЕЧЕРКОМ ПОСИДЕТЬ ПОЮЗАТЬ МАГИИ, РАЗНОВИДНОСТЬ КОТОРЫХ РАДУЕТ, НО БОЛЬШИНСТВО БЕСПОЛЕЗНЫ. МОБЫ СДЕЛАНЫ НЕ ПЛОХО, ОПЯТЬ ЖЕ УЧИТЫВАЯ ЧТО ИГРА СТАРАЯ И В ПРИНЦИПЕ В НАШЕ ВРЕМЯ, ТАКОЕ НЕ ЧАСТО ВСТРЕТИШЬ. ТАКЖЕ ХОЧУ ОТМЕТИТЬ, ЧТО  САМЫЙ БОЛЬШОЙ МИНУС ДЛЯ МЕНЯ ЭТО БЫЛО  БЕСКОНЕЧНЫЙ СБОР И ПРОДАЖА ЛУТА, КОТОРЫЙ ЗАНИМАЕТ ПОЛОВИНУ, ЕСЛИ НЕ 70% ИГРОВОГО ПРОЦЕССА
ПО ДЕСЯТИ БАЛЬНОЙ ШКАЛЕ Я БЫ ПОСТАВИЛ 4.

Solange ich noch Windows nutzte(ca 2019) konnte ich das Spiel starten und auch geniessen.

Startet man es unter Linux steht man häufig vor dem Problem, das die NATIVE Version eben NICHT startet.
Bekommt man das mit einer anderen Protonversion zum laufen dann fehlt der TON -.- (killt die Atmosphäre).

Selbst die GloriousEggRoll(oder so ^^) von 6 bis 7 änderten leider nichts daran.

Mit Protontricks soll das funktionieren(siehe https://www.protondb.com/app/1930 ) .
Ich habe so meine Schwierigkeiten mit protontricks, daher suchte ich eine Alternative:

Abhilfe soll eine Betaversion liefern (Eigenschaften-Betas-Betazugangspasswort: TW1LinuxBETA).
Und Überraschung: Spiel startet, Videos haben TON, Musik spielt, Sprachausgabe funktioniert!
Lediglich die Maussteuerung bei der Charaktererstellung ist ETWAS schnell..
Leichte Bedienung und sehr interessant. Spannende Aufgaben zu lösen
Hot garbage

I've put a little bit of time into this and my first impression of this game is that it's pretty much Oblivion 2. Horrible voice acting and graphics to match. But that doesn't mean I hate it. So far, I've only got a few complaints; 1. Why the hell do I have to register/ put my street address to play online? I mean, servers are dead, but if I want to play with a friend using other means, why? 2. The combat is a bit strange, I'm not going to say it's 'souls-like' [spoiler] adding a dodge mechanic doesn't automatically make it one [/spoiler], but it makes me think of a super early version of Demon's Souls, or at least a game that has something similar. But it overall turns the game into a 'turn-based' game (swing, dodge, swing, dodge, repeat). 3. Enemies tend to pretty much gang-up on you. When in-combat, you're usually facing up to five enemies at a time and it can be troublesome. So, unless you're using AOE spells or have something with a wide swing, you're gonna have a bad time. 4. Enemies are also [b] EVERYWHERE [/b]. You can just be wandering around and suddenly, something is aggro'd out of the bushes and it's 5 wolves.

I do like some of the mechanics, like if you find a duplicate item, you can improve an item you've already got, same with magic. Magic overall does seem pretty neat and there are quite a lot of skills to use for other builds. I have been enjoying it so far, and I think I intend to enjoy it more.

I also bought it on-sale, so if you want, buy it then.

Why did I buy this?
Let me answer that question, its because it fucking sucks.


Now everyone else, buy this game.

Даже на те времена игра игра сделана халтурно. Большой и пустой открытый мир. Хоть и есть разнообразные локации, но почему то волки и медведи есть в каждой из них, кроме разве что пустыни. Боёвка очень примитивная. Сколько не качайся тебя все равно ванштотят одни и те же мобы. А как реализованы поездки на лошадях... Ну умора просто.

Surprisingly good! Or... at least not bad. The world has a slightly reminiscent feel of The Elderscrolls 3: Morrowind in terms of scope -- it just seems huge. If you can look past the clunky combat, some general frame rate/stuttering issues and the takes-itself-too-serious dialogue, then you'll find an unpolished gem here that merits a look. 

     Two Worlds shows its age quite a bit, but it does some things that are pretty interesting for its time, such as: mounts (and mounted combat), the way you combine weapons or armor or spell cards of like type by drag an' drop to upgrade them, and the magic system itself, which has a layer of complexity that isn't as common in today's RPGs. For a few bucks on sale, it's worth a handful of hours of entertainment.

I made a video review for Two Worlds. Feel free to check it out!

https://youtu.be/0RJen6DMLWw

In short, Two Worlds is awful. The clunky game mechanics make it laborious to play and the story and voice-acting are amateur.

I've tried to see the positives in this game over the years, because I know some people really enjoy it, but I can't see past its glaring issues. 

The review that I've done is quite short and based on my first impressions of playing the game again after shelving it for a long time. In the coming weeks I'll be forcing myself to play more Two Worlds to see if I can scrape any joy out of it.

_________________________
_________________________
Update - Post-completion: 

After finishing the game, I have warmer feelings towards it. It's still terrible, but sometimes funny. Once you get better gear/level up, the combat is much more manageable, too. 

Still wouldn't recommend it. I think the only people that this game will appeal to (and rightly so) is people that played it around launch that are nostalgic for it.

Irgendwie mein guilty Pleasure. Hölzerne Geschichte, Hölzernes Gameplay aber die Powercurve ist einfach super und das ständige Looten und Leveln macht mich einfach glücklich. Später wird man auch so lächerlich stark, das erfüllt so ein paar Allmachtsphantasien.
un clasicazo

I'm glad I gave it a chance as I can definitely see why it's turned into kind of a cult classic, but there's too much jank to really recommend it. There's some cool ideas here like ghosts of things you've slain coming back to haunt you at night or with the tarot card magic system and the ability to combine like items into stronger variants of themselves on the fly, but it's hampered by a clunky and poor feeling combat system, confusing journal/quest system, and a nonsensical story. Worst though is the large barren world that has few points of interest, and although stealing a horse does make travel a little easier, the horse riding and management system also are not very well implemented. Great soundtrack though.
This game really surprised me it did. WOW!

Году этак в 2008, однокурсник очень рьяно советовал мне поиграть в данную игру. Года 2 назад я купил её рублей за 50 и вот только сейчас решил проверить что же это за игра. Рпг в открытом мире, эпичный сюжет и всё такое.. Ну.. Сказать, что я разочаровался, это ничего не сказать. Графика, анимации, боёвка, да даже управление. Здесь всё как из дерева и картона. Если ты дерёшься с мобами на ландшафтном спуске или подъёме, то на попадание можно даже не расчитывать. Открытый мир, ну по факту он есть, но он пустой, только мобы расставлены группами и деревушки, где непеси будут давать абсолютно одинаковые и неинтересные задания "убей/принеси". По миру раскиданы "кресты", при нахождении рядом с которыми ты хилишься, эти кресты стоят вообще везде (используются так же как точки респавна), даже в данжах. Ты можешь выманивать врагов на этот крест и хилясь убивать целыми пачками. Это абсолютно нивелирует прокачку персонажа и способности, типа "Исцеление". 2007 год выпуска. Ну это же уже TES: Oblivion, Dark Messiah of Might & Magic, Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines, Готика 3 на худой конец (хотя вот готан это плохой пример, наверное). В любом случае я не нашёл в себе силы играть дальше. Возможно хорошие отзывы в стиме, это не более чем ностальгирующие люди, хотя я не понимаю по чему здесь можно ностальгировать (это как восхищаться тем что играл в Need for Russia, когда все играли в Need for Speed)

[h1] COMPRE SOMENTE SE ESTIVER NA PROMOÇÃO [/h1]

Vamos começar do inicio. Se você busca ter algo pra fazer enquanto espera um download, gosta de ver historias novas e multi-classe...esse jogo é perfeito! Os gráficos são bem bacanas pra época em que foi lançado (sendo a ser comparado com Oblivion em alguns pontos). O que mais me impressiona nesse jogo é o fato de que logo no inicio, não se tem muitas explicações sobre como funciona a HUD e comandos (Pra castar magia levei 2 horas ate entender que tem slots de magia, equipo 1 magia por slot e usa aquela, quer fazer um combo de 7 magias diferentes? Boa sorte.) mas da pra ir pegando conforme você vai jogando. A campanha não me motivou nem um pouco, os plots são mais ou menos, joguei rushando pra ver se a historia melhorava e... bem andar 40km num jogo em que vc se move 4m/s é complicado. Claro que todo RPG voce tem que explorar e essa é um requisito muito importante em jogos como esse, mas enjoa, os cenários são bacaninhas, mas ate você chegar em um ponto interessante, você já vai ter perdido muito tempo, fora que os cavalos são 10x mais bugados que os de Skyrim.

[b] EU PAGUEI R$10,00 [b]

Para um jogo (EM MINHA HUMILDE OPINIÃO) desse nivel e sendo cômico em alguns momentos, ele vale R$10,00. Valeria R$20,00 se concertassem esses cavalos com H1N1.

Enfim, obrigado por ler minha análise! 
Se te desmotivou a gastar seus R$20,00 relaxa, enquanto escrevo, the Witcher esta 15 reais...isso mesmo, não cometa o mesmo erro que eu!

P.s: Mas se mesmo assim comprar, se divirta! É o famoso "é ruim mas é baum"

honestly i enjoyed this game when i was younger and i still do to this day. if you can look past the graphics and voice acting, the worldbuilding and quests are pretty good. yeah, it has its problems, but overall its charming and entertaining in its own way. 10/10.

This game need a modern hardware support update like. windows 10 64bit and 4 GB update. Also maybe directors cut Edition update. Before Two Worlds III official release. And please adding achievement too.

P.S: my favorite warrior build it's Spear's Master's.
Bad clone of Elder Scrolls or Gothic. Open world, boring improvements.

Two Worlds : Epic Edition may have been a ambitious project and was advertised to be an Oblivion killer (TES:IV). Though the game wasn't really great, it still had charm for someone with low expectations in general like me. Speaking from just my 12 hours. The gameplay isn't bad, but not great either. There is one major game breaking bug that makes the town hostile towards you forever where you meet the one dude in that tells you about your captured sister. Besides that, there is a lot of running around in areas of the map that just feels barren and feels like there should've been more to an area that looks interesting. The game has ragdoll physics if you're into that. It has a respawn system where you teleport to the nearest stone thingy that can be easily exploited when fighting much more tougher mobs. There's this one spell that basically turns anything into a friendly and I admit that when starting out the game, it was brutal. The difficulty was too hard for me and to have fun, I had to use cheat codes to get most of my hours in. While I was playing the game in cheat mode, I actually had fun. Sure there was excessive amounts of running biome to biome, the one charm this game has aside from the difficulty was my curiosity to explore and see if its a place of interest for me as a treasure hunter. Would I recommend this game? Honestly, no, but if you're looking to just play anything, go for it. The game in itself was pretty entertaining when after several hours when things are starting to feel like progress, or you begin by finding better shinies. Anyone can find a game fun in their own terms of how to achieve that fun. Lastly, I couldn't finish the story because of that one major bug I mentioned. I didn't feel like starting over, but most of my gameplay was mainly from exploring and doing side quests.

Gra na początku dość toporna. Chciałem zagrać w coś w starszym klimacie i zagrałem. Po paru minutach prawie odinstalowałem. Była nudna i sztywna. Ale żeby nie odpuścić łatwo, olałem fabułę i zacząłem biegać po mapie tłukąc orków i inne stwory, po drodze robiąc misje poboczne. W końcu na 60+ poziomie wbitym w terenie wróciłem do fabuły... która okazała się strasznie krótka, kiedy już miało się dostępne teleporty na mapie i wyczyszczone z "potworów" jaskinie i inne miejsca potrzebne w wątku głównym. A zakończenie nastąpiło w momencie, w którym akcja mogła się dopiero rozkręcić, szczególnie, że jednak duża część mapy nadal ukryta. No ale grze dam mocne 7/10

(PL)
Takie "Polanie IV / Knight Shift IV" tylko w wersji RPG i w 3D.
PLUSY
- otwarty świat gry - w pełni możemy zwiedzać cały świat od samego początku gry( i popływać też jak zrobimy umiejętność pływanie)
- można zbierać zioła i inne składniki alchemiczne i robić z nich mikstury (czasowe lub stałe)
- można łączyć dwie takie same bronie/zbroje (są tu pewne ograniczenia jednak - nie połączymy broni z obrażeniami od ognia z tą samą ale z obrażeniami od zimna na przykład)
- można jeździć i walczyć konno
- są teleporty stałe i 3 sztuki przenośnych
MINUSY
- misje powinny być jeszcze raz przejżane i przemyślane ponieważ część nie da się wykonać lub mają błędy
- misja główna w zasadzie nie prowadzi nas po misjach pobocznych (ale jest bardzo prosta i krótka)
- laski magiczne nie strzelają to tylko broń ręczna
INNE
- grupy przeciwników najlepiej załatwić - czar Fala Mrozu z magi wody i jak zamarzną to już czym tam mamy w rękach . Opłaca się więc zainwestować w magię wody i mieć parę punktów w Siłę Woli
- do pokonania Reista i Gandohara na końcu gry potrzeba czaru "Tarcza Odbijająca" z magii ziemi ale trzeba mieć poziom 15 tej szkoły magii
- można ocalić mieszkańców Ashos ale (prawdopodobnie ale na 100% nie jestem pewien) zanim weźmiemy kamień wody to najpierw trzeba wykonać misję od nekromanty ze spalonego lasy na maszynę do zabijania orków (ta misja otwiera nam też bramę do twierdzy orków Gon Gammar)
Das Spiel läßt sich gut bedienen. Eine wunderschöne Welt. Endgegner sind cool. Habe mich gut unterhalten.
SZUPER JÁTÉK!
It's a good solid RPG.

Got it for a dollar? Check
Put a ton of time into it compared to the cost? Check
Funny one liners? Check

Yep, it's positive review time.
Way ahead of its time, still holds up for some nostalgic fun.
rpg

Polskie RPG w starym stylu, Gothic jest skojarzeniem jak najbardziej na miejscu. Gra w podobny sposób prowadzi questy i rozwiązuje progresję. Jest w podobny sposób drewniana i niewygodna. Ale w podobny sposób przewrotnie sprawia to że jest wciągająca i grywalna. Fabuła również daje radę i świat jest pełen tajemnic które chcemy zgłębiać podczas jego zwiedzania. Gdy wybaczymy tej grze jej drewnianość to czeka nas całkiem niezła oldschoolowa gra RPG w klimatach fantasy.

I remember when i played this game the first time around the time it came out. I had posters from the game and was using them as wallpapers on my monitor and was imagining all the adventures i could have. 

The first time i played this game i didn't even talk with the bad guy that was waiting for me after the tutorial area. I went around the map and killed what i saw and upgraded my armor/weapons. This game had a really weird but interesting upgrade system, if you had items of the same type and name you could combine them to raise the stats on the item. After some hours i came back to the starting area then pretty much dominated the antagonist. Figure me surprised when the game went straight to credits after i killed him without doing a single quest.

I like this but the passing of years have not been kind on it. It's fun to remember the good old times but i wouldn't recommend it to newcomers.

Two worlds is an engaging open world RPG that is a ton of fun to play. For it's time, it has fun combat, a great magic and gear system and quite a few pleasantly surprising quests. 

However, it runs like crap on modern hardware. When I started to play it would crash every 10 minutes or every couple save attempts. As I played it got worse and worse. Crashes occurred every 5 minutes, then 3 minutes, and now I simply cannot leave the town I am in without crashing. No settings, exe preferences or config hacks will fix it. I tried to push through it but after hundreds of crashes it has finally become unplayable.

Unless you're going to run this one 2008 hardware with a 2008 OS, it's not playable. skip it.
Игра детства....
Truly the greatest work of art seen in human history. 10/10. H A R D   O N E S.
Ностальгическая игра гриндилка. После затирания Готики 3 до дыр еще в давние времена, эта игра смогла нехило завлечь! :)

Мм, честно сказать ощущения неоднозначные. Могу порекомендовать тем, кто как и я когда то играл в нее в далеких нулевых, чтобы вспомнить былые светлые деньки и понастальгировать. Но в цнлом, я бы сказал что в игре больше минусов, чем плюсов. Мир просто огромный но нереально пустой, максимум развлекалова здесь это открывать черные участки карты ( мазохизм).  Все таланты (активные) абсолютно не имеют смысла - с самого начала игры и до финального босса, максимум что вам понадобится это банальный райт клик и изредка какая то магия. Боевка унылая, о сюдете и квестовых диалогах и говорить нечего. Зато, для любителей разогнать статы и сделать терминатора, в игре как раз есть все необходимое для этого.

Had bought this game as part of a Two World's 1 and 2 discounted package several years back... Played TW2, but never finished it... Started playing the first a couple weeks ago and realized how underrated this game has been... Personally, I enjoy this game way better than the sequel... If you love the Elder Scrolls games then you need to give this one a go... Yeah, the voice acting is sometimes a bit cheesy and the graphics are dated; but the gameplay and complex storyline of this overlooked classic are the real stars of this overlooked gem...
its a very nice game
